means: （以人们喜爱的方式）魔鬼似的

sentence.Network_en: He was handsome, with a devilish charm.
sentence.Network_cn: 他英俊漂亮，具有魔鬼般的迷惑力。

sentence.Network_en: Devilish pretty girl that!'Pon my soul, an amazing little creature!

entry.def: A devilish idea or action is cruel or unpleasant.

example.tran: 现代武器残忍的毁灭性

entry.tran: 极大的;极度的;极其困难的
entry.def: You can use devilish to emphasize how extreme or difficult something is.

means.word_mean: 1. showing the cunning or ingenuity or wickedness typical of a devil;

sentences.sentence: "the cold calculation and diabolic art of some statesmen"

means.word_mean: 2. playful in an appealingly bold way;

sentences.sentence: "the socialists are further handicapped if they believe that capitalists are not only wicked but also devilishly clever"
